thread.title: Outerwall Inc. to Present at the B. Riley & Co. and Great American Group Consumer Conference
thread.title_full: Outerwall Inc. to Present at the B. Riley & Co. and Great American Group Consumer Conference

author: admin
title: Outerwall Inc. to Present at the B. Riley & Co. and Great American Group Consumer Conference
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/9/2015 @ 2:23 PM   Outerwall Inc. 
BELLEVUE, Wash., Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Outerwall Inc. (Nasdaq: OUTR) announced today that its Chief Financial Officer Galen C. Smith plans to present at the B. Riley & Co. and Great American Group Consumer Conference in New York on September 16, 2015, at 10:30 a.m. Eastern Time. 
(Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20130701/AQ41388LOGO ) 
The presentation will be webcast live and archived on the Investor Relations section of Outerwall's corporate website at ir.outerwall.com . 
About Outerwall Inc. 
Outerwall Inc. (Nasdaq: OUTR) has more than 20 years of experience creating some of the most profitable spaces for their retail partners. The company delivers breakthrough kiosk experiences that delight consumers and generate revenue for retailers. As the company that brought consumers Redbox(®) entertainment, Coinstar(®) money services, and ecoATM(®) electronics recycling kiosks, Outerwall is leading the next generation of automated retail and paving the way for inventive, scalable businesses. Outerwall(TM) kiosks are in neighborhood grocery stores, drug stores, mass merchants, malls, and other retail locations in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico, the United Kingdom, and Ireland. Learn more at www.outerwall.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/outerwall-inc-to-present-at-the-b-riley--co-and-great-american-group-consumer-conference-300140361.html 
SOURCE Outerwall Inc.
